simple.gui.factory

Class SJOptionPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.gui.factory.SJOptionPane

  • public final class SJOptionPane
extends java.lang.Object
    Depends on simple.util.Utils Tames JOptionPane by predefining commonly used values.
    Created: Mar 6, 2009
    Author:
    Kenneth Pierce

      • mINF

        public static final int mINF
        These are the message types and determines what icon will be displayed.
        • mINF = Information Message
        • mGEN = General(Plain) Message
        • mASK = Question Message.
        • mWARN = Warning Message
        • mERR = Error Message
        Values taken from JOptionPane.
        See Also:
        JOptionPane, showMessage(String, String, int), showQuestionMessage(String, String, int), Constant Field Values

      • moYN

        public static final int moYN
        These define the options and return values for showQuestionMessage(String, String, int).
        These values are taken from JOptionPane.
        • moYN = Shows the buttons Yes and No.
        • moOC = Shows the buttons OK and Cancel
        • moYNC = Shows the buttons Yes, No, and Cancel.
        • moOK = Value returned if OK was selected.
        • moCANCEL = Value returned if Cancel was selected.
        • moYES = Value returned if Yes was selected.
        • moNO = Value returned if No was selected.
        • moCLOSED = Value returned if the window was closed without the user selecting something
        See Also:
        JOptionPane, showQuestionMessage(String, String, int), Constant Field Values

      • moOC

        public static final int moOC
        These define the options and return values for showQuestionMessage(String, String, int).
        These values are taken from JOptionPane.
        • moYN = Shows the buttons Yes and No.
        • moOC = Shows the buttons OK and Cancel
        • moYNC = Shows the buttons Yes, No, and Cancel.
        • moOK = Value returned if OK was selected.
        • moCANCEL = Value returned if Cancel was selected.
        • moYES = Value returned if Yes was selected.
        • moNO = Value returned if No was selected.
        • moCLOSED = Value returned if the window was closed without the user selecting something
        See Also:
        JOptionPane, showQuestionMessage(String, String, int), Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • showQuestionMessage

        public static int showQuestionMessage(java.lang.String mess,
                                      java.lang.String title,
                                      int mOptions)
        Displays a JOptionPane dialog box that asks a question and returns the user's selection.
        Parameters:
        mess - Question to be displayed.
        title - Title of the Dialog box.
        mOptions - One of moYN, moOC, moYNC.
        Returns:
        Result from JOptionPane.showConfirmationMessage(...).

      • showMessage

        public static void showMessage(java.lang.String mess,
                               java.lang.String title,
                               int mType)
        Displays a JOptionPane dialog box that displays a message. Calls JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object, java.lang.String, int).
        Parameters:
        mess - Message to be displayed.
        title - Title of the dialog box.
        mType - One of mINF, mGEN, mASK, mWARN, or mERR.

      • prompt

        public static java.lang.String prompt(java.lang.String message,
                                      java.lang.String initValue)
        Prompts the user for text input. Calls (@link javax.swing.JOptionPane#showInputDialog(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object)}.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to be displayed.
        initValue - Initial value of the text box.
        Returns:
        Contents of the input box.

      • prompt

        public static java.lang.String prompt(java.lang.String message)
        Prompts the used for text input. Calls JOptionPane.showInputDialog(java.lang.Object)
        Parameters:
        message - Message to be displayed.
        Returns:
        Contents of the input box.

        parent - Component to center on. Can be null.
        str - Message to display.

      • showErrorMessage

                                    java.lang.Throwable th)
        Predefined error message box that shows the error stack trace as the message.
        Parameters:
        parent - Component to center on. Can be null.
        th - Error to show stack trace for.

      • getConfirmation

        public static boolean getConfirmation(java.awt.Component parent,
                                      java.lang.String str)
        Predefined confirmation message box.
        Parameters:
        parent - Component to center on. Can be null.
        str - Message to display.
        Returns:
        True is yes, false if no or closed with no selection.

      • getFileName

        public static java.lang.String getFileName(java.awt.Component parent)
        Opens a JFileChooser and returns the result.
        author Rana Bhattacharyya
        Parameters:
        parent - Component to center on.
        Returns:
        String of the file's path or null if no file was selected.

      • getFileName

        public static java.io.File getFileName(java.awt.Component parent,
                                       javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter filter)
        Parameters:
        parent - Component to center on.
        filter - Filter to use for filtering displayed files.
        Returns:
        Resulting file or null if none were selected or box was closed by means other than the Open button.

      • getFileNames

        public static java.io.File[] getFileNames(java.awt.Component parent)
        Opens a JFileChooser and returns the result.
        Adapted from code by Rana Bhattacharyya
        Parameters:
        parent - Component to center on.
        Returns:
        String of the file's path or null if no file was selected.

      • getDirName

        public static java.io.File getDirName(java.awt.Component parent)
        Opens a JFileChooser and returns the result.
        Adapted from code by Rana Bhattacharyya
        Parameters:
        parent - Component to center on.
        Returns:
        String of the directory path or null if nothing was selected or box closed abnormally.
